name: Italian-Style Roasted Baby Potatoes
author: Jules
summary: These roasted baby potatoes are a quick and easy side dish that can be made while the main dish is cooking.
ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking dish or rimmed sheet with foil
Place halved potatoes in a large resealable plastic bag
Add olive oil and Italian dressing mix, seal bag, and shake until all potatoes are coated evenly
Transfer to the prepared baking dish
Roast in the preheated oven until tender, flipping potatoes halfway through cooking time, about 30 minutes
